    index="index",
    settings={
        "analysis": {
            "normalizer": {
                "my_normalizer": {
                    "type": "custom",
                    "char_filter": [],
                    "filter": [
                        "lowercase",
                        "asciifolding"

        }
    },
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "foo": {
                "type": "keyword",
                "normalizer": "my_normalizer"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
